alert.note: Alert for Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 9:34AM EDT until July 16 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rockingham County in southern New Hampshire... * Until 1015 AM EDT. * At 933 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Derry, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Derry, Epping, Raymond, Londonderry, Auburn, Chester, Fremont, Deerfield, Candia, Nottingham and Sandown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for central and southern New Hampshire. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for central and southern New Hampshire.
